Positions Wanted -2-
June - 9 Wrote scripts, continuity for WHA, Madison, Wisconsin,, Produced
and edited state-wide tape-recorded programs at WHA as staff member of Wis¬
consin Idea Theater. Winner in one and three act play contests sponsored
by University of Wisconsin; radio script contest sponsored by Association
for Education by Radio. Playwrite-in-Residenee at University of Wisconsin
under Rockefeller Foundation Fellowship in Playwriting.
June - 10 Looking for position as producer or assistant producer in educat¬
ional television, or assistant producer in educational films; script writer
in educational televisions or film; television publicity writer. Can be com¬
bined with teaching if necessajy.
June - 11 Has advanced degree in physics. Has had considerable experience
with radio and television programs with a science format. Among the shows he
has done are: "Science in Review" over WMEB, Portsmouth, N. Hc; "Sound of
Things" now being created; "Science Sketches" over WBZ-TV, Boston (awarded the
1953 citation of the Massachusetts Society of Professional Engineers); "Today"
several guest spots on this NBC show; "The Menace" over WBZ-TV, Boston.
